title: When can i send the N-400 form for naturalization?
question: I qualifiy to apply for my naturalization because im married to a us citizen.
answers:
You can file 2years and 9 months after the original greencard (even if conditional greencard). However, since you are filing under marriage, make sure you put a lot of evidence of the bona fide of the marriage.

Good Luck

You may file now as you are within the 90 days prior to the three years since your green card was issued. Be sure you qualify otherwise such as having physical presence in the US and the state where you are filing, and include filign fee, two passport photos, copy of your green card, copy of your passport to show travel.
